decisions.what: Professional brand color palette (30% lighter) + Typography scale

Updated: brand-primary: #6B9B8D, brand-dark: #2A4A47, brand-medium-dark: #3F5A54, brand-medium: #547E75, brand-light: #8FB5A8, brand-very-light: #EAF4F1. Applied to all sections including header navigation
Moved carousel dots from overlay position to below the carousel with proper spacing for better UX and professional appearance
Migrated from rounded-2xl/rounded-3xl to consistent rounded-xl throughout the app for cleaner design
Removed distracting gradient backgrounds and decorative blobs, replaced with alternating white/gray-50 sections
